title: Portfolio Website
description: This website! Serves to keep my projects in one place and keep me motivated. A sort of playground where I can practice React development.

title: Name Learning Game
description: A mobile game designed to help users memorize names and faces in a fun and interactive way. Ideal for educators and team leads.

title: Astronomy Database
description: A database system for cataloging celestial objects and astronomical events, complete with advanced filtering and API access.

title: Liked Songs Manager
description: A web tool using the Spotify API to help users remove old or unwanted liked songs based on artist and listening history.
